catchphrase: HalfStack Phoenix returns in early 2025 at the Majestic Theater Gilbert.
description: Up to 225 Web / JavaScript / Mobile / IoT developers and decision makers
Mostly from the Phoenix area, with some from throughout the US, Europe and beyond
faqs: If you're not from the Phoenix area, note that Phoenix is very spread out, and we picked the Majestic Theatre because it's an amazing experience, but it is not centrally located. There are 2 hotels within a 2 minute walk of the venue as well as Airbnb options.
schedule: HalfStack starts around 10am, includes approximately 10 sessions, breaks, lunch, dinner, and the JS Pub Quiz and movie afterparty. Plan to arrive between 9:00-9:45am and stay late!

sessions.title: We've announced our first four presenters. Check back regularly as we build an amazing day of fun!

description: Jen delivered some of the most amazing HalfStack talks in New York and online, and will join us in Phoenix to share a much different take on AI. Jen has done amazing work over the years supporting communities at Telerik, Microsoft and AWS, and is passionate about supporting new engineers in their quest to learn more about web technologies.
sessions.title: Cultural heritage and AI

description: William wowed us in 2022 with an incredible JS & AI talk when that was a new topic. Last year William showed us the idea of building an easy to use peer-to-peer social network. We can't wait to reveal what William has planned for 2025!
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: From creating a network over images to robots playing music via Web Bluetooth to an incredible look at WebGPU, Luis has dazzled us at previous HalfStack events. We'll soon reveal Luis' 2025 session details.
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: Malak gave us a fresh look at accessibility at last year's HalfStack Phoenix event. We'll soon share their 2025 session details.
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: Bekah will do a music related performance... that's all we're saying for now!
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: Rene has wowed us with his combination of maps, music, and data viz. We'll soon share what he's planning for HalfStack Phoenix!
sessions.title: To be revealed

description: Want to share something you've been working on lately? Spend 2-3 minutes on stage sharing your project! First-come, first-served sign-ups on the day of the event.
sessions.title: Lightning Talks

description: We will kick off the afterparty with Battledecks, a tech improv game. You have 5 minutes to pitch a fake tech startup from a randomly generated slide deck. Then we'll proceed in teams with our unique JS Pub Quiz! There will be a big raffle, and then we'll then watch a retro tech movie, and if there's interest, we'll conclude with karaoke!
sessions.title: Afterparty (Dinner, JS Pub Quiz, Battledecks, Raffle, Retro Tech movie, and karaoke)
